entry.title: Data visualization with plotly py: Version 3 and beyond - Jon Mease
Bringing ipywidgets Support to plotly.py
entry.summary:
Description

We describe our efforts to bring full ipywidgets support to the plotly.py data visualization library. This work brings many exciting new features to Jupyter Notebook users working with plotly.py including Python callbacks, in-place figure updates, binary array serialization, and integration with the broader ipywidgets ecosystem.Presenter(s): Speaker: Jon Mease, Johns Hopkins Applied Physics Laboratory
